FuncDef: This command specifies which days of the month that the schedule will occur. Multiple days of the month can be specified. When multiple days are configured, each of them will cause the schedule to trigger. If a day-of-month is configured without configuringmonth,weekday,hourandminute, the event will not execute.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the positive integers specify the day of the month counting from the first of the month. The negative integers specify the day of the month counting from the last day of the month. For example, configuring day-of-month -5, 5 in a month that has 31 days will specify the schedule to occur on the 27th and 5th of that month. Values-1 to 31, -31 to -1 (maximum 62 day-numbers).
Specifies all days of the month.
